msbt.message: The weather has finally warmed up, my dear, and that means it's time to get outside!But what should I wear? The weather changes so quickly from one moment to the next this time of year. Hot. Cold. Hot. Cold. Spring is a fashion conundrum!
Whew Every day is hotter than the last. But surviving the summer heat is all part of island living, I suppose. Plus, a nice flush in the cheeks gives one's complexion an attractive glow.
Life is a little easier now that summer has moved on and the weather has cooled down. Though now that those clamorous cicadas have calmed down, I find I miss their chirping voices.
The colors are so faded during the winter. It can feelquite dreary.Of course, winter's glum hue will help us appreciate the spring colors when they arrive!
I love spring! The smell of flowers blooming and plants growing that's the smell of a new beginning! It makes me want to start fresh too. Yes! I think I'll do it! Meet the new , darling!
In this summer heat, it's all I can do not to melt into a puddle.Most importantly, I mustn't let the makeup melt right off my face!
I find the autumn breeze so alluring. There's nothing like watching the falling leaves blowing on the wind. Alas, there is one problem it leaves my hair an absolute mess, !

Brrrr, it's so cold When it gets like this, I can't muster the motivation to do laundry or clean or anything! Why, I see that look on your face! I am NOT just making up excuses! Thoughcould you blame me?
When it gets warm like this, I start feeling a little drowsyThe weather is so pleasantperfect for taking a nap
On days like today, I can't help but think about how the spring rains make everything young again. I just wish they would do the same for me, !
Why, don't you look fabulous, ! It seems the summer weather suits you perfectly! Is it the vitamin D from the sun? Is it the warm glow on your cheeks? You MUST tell me your secret!
Even after the sun sets, it's still so hot. I do hope you're holding up OK, . Honestly, I hate to complain. When it's the middle of the winter, I'll miss all this heat.
They say fall is the best time for playing sports, what with the cooler weather and all. I considered trying . After all, I hear it's all the rage. Alas, I'm not sure the outfits suit me.
I think the fall is an excellent time to take up a new hobby, don't you?Whether it's or , one must stay busy as the year slows down.
Running into you has made going out in this cold weather worth it, ! No matter how chilly it is, talking to a good friend warms my heart.
If I hide myself away from the cold weather all day, I just end up feeling tired and sluggish. So, I took the plunge and forced myself to go outsideand, well, I am certainly wide awake now!
